nml_option.name: config_use_sedimentTracers
nml_option.description: if true, the 'sedimentGRP' category is enabled for the run

nml_option.name: config_use_sedimentTracers_surface_bulk_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, surface bulk forcing from coupler is added to surfaceTracerFlux in 'sedimentGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_sedimentTracers_surface_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, surface restoring source is applied to tracers in 'sedimentGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_sedimentTracers_interior_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, interior restoring source is applied to tracers in 'sedimentGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_sedimentTracers_exponential_decay
nml_option.description: if true, exponential decay source is applied to tracers in 'sedimentGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_sedimentTracers_idealAge_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, idealAge forcing source is applied to tracers in 'sedimentGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_sedimentTracers_ttd_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, transit time distribution forcing source is applied to tracers in 'sedimentGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_sedimentTracers_surface_value
nml_option.description: if true, surface value is computed for 'sedimentGRP' category

package.name: sedimentTracersPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to include sedimentTracers.

package.name: sedimentTracersBulkRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute bulk restoring on the sedimentTracers group.

package.name: sedimentTracersSurfaceRestoringsPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute surface restoring on the sedimentTracers group.

package.name: sedimentTracersInteriorRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute interior restoring on the sedimentTracers group.

package.name: sedimentTracersExponentialDecayPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute exponential decay on the sedimentTracers group.

package.name: sedimentTracersIdealAgePKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute ideal age forcing on the sedimentTracers group.

package.name: sedimentTracersTTDPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute transit-time distribution forcing on the sedimentTracers group.

var.name: sedConcenSurfaceFlux
var.description: Flux of (suspended) sediment Concentration through the ocean surface. Positive into ocean

var.name: sedConcenSurfaceFluxRunoff
var.description: Flux of (suspended) sediment through the ocean surface due to river runoff. Positive into ocean

var.name: sedConcenSurfaceFluxRemoved
var.description: Flux of (suspended) sediment that is ignored coming into the ocean. Positive into ocean.
